import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const YOUTUBE_SCOPES=['https://www.googleapis.com/auth/youtube.readonly','https://www.googleapis.com/auth/userinfo.profile','https://www.googleapis.com/auth/userinfo.email'].join(' ');const CLIENT_ID='678018511336-jgd34uakj7vika3m6nvf028ekcfu2ucf.apps.googleusercontent.com';function startGoogleOAuth(){const redirectUri=window.location.origin+'/auth/callback';const state=Math.random().toString(36).substring(2,15);localStorage.setItem('oauth_state',state);const url=`https://accounts.google.com/o/oauth2/v2/auth?`+`client_id=${CLIENT_ID}&`+`redirect_uri=${encodeURIComponent(redirectUri)}&`+`response_type=token&`+`scope=${encodeURIComponent(YOUTUBE_SCOPES)}&`+`include_granted_scopes=true&`+`state=${state}&`+`prompt=consent`;window.location.href=url;}function extractTokenFromUrl(){const hash=window.location.hash;console.log('üîç Checking URL hash:',hash);if(!hash||!hash.includes('access_token')){return null;}const params=new URLSearchParams(hash.substring(1));const accessToken=params.get('access_token');const state=params.get('state');const storedState=localStorage.getItem('oauth_state');if(state&&state===storedState){localStorage.removeItem('oauth_state');return{accessToken};}return null;}export default function GoogleAuthSimple(){const navigate=useNavigate();const{login}=useAuth();const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[authStep,setAuthStep]=useState('checking');useEffect(()=>{const handleAuth=async()=>{console.log('üîç Simple auth check...');// 1. Check for OAuth token in URL
const tokenData=extractTokenFromUrl();if(tokenData){console.log('‚úÖ Found OAuth token, processing...');window.history.replaceState(null,null,'/auth');await processAuth(tokenData.accessToken);return;}// 2. Check if already signed in
const token=localStorage.getItem('google_token');const userData=localStorage.getItem('user_info');if(token&&userData){console.log('‚úÖ Already signed in, checking status...');const user=JSON.parse(userData);login();try{const podcasts=await getUserPodcasts(user.sub);if(podcasts&&podcasts.length>0){console.log('‚úÖ Has podcasts ‚Üí dashboard');navigate('/dashboard');}else{console.log('üìù No podcasts ‚Üí onboarding');navigate('/create-podcast');}}catch(error){console.error('Error checking podcasts:',error);setAuthStep('idle');}}else{console.log('üìù Not signed in, showing login');setAuthStep('idle');}};handleAuth();},[navigate,login]);const processAuth=async accessToken=>{setLoading(true);try{// Store token
localStorage.setItem('google_token',accessToken);// Get user info
const response=await fetch(`https://www.googleapis.com/oauth2/v2/userinfo?access_token=${accessToken}`);const userData=await response.json();localStorage.setItem('user_info',JSON.stringify(userData));login();console.log(`üîç Checking podcasts for ${userData.name}...`);// Check if user has podcasts
const podcasts=await getUserPodcasts(userData.sub);if(podcasts&&podcasts.length>0){console.log('‚úÖ Has podcasts ‚Üí dashboard');toast.success(`Welcome back, ${userData.name}!`);navigate('/dashboard');}else{console.log('üìù No podcasts ‚Üí onboarding');toast.success(`Welcome, ${userData.name}! Let's create your podcast.`);navigate('/create-podcast');}}catch(error){console.error('Auth error:',error);toast.error('Authentication
